articles.title: Breakout Watch: Aerospace Giant Flies Toward Record High
articles.mainIdea: Breakout Watch: Aerospace Giant Flies Toward Record High
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Breakout Watch: Aerospace Giant Flies Toward Record High. Boosted by strong demand driven by strong growth for the aerospace behemoth, GE stock has a breakout in its sights.

articles.title: Stock Of The Day In Buy Zone With Business 'Firing On All Cylinders'
articles.mainIdea: Stock Of The Day In Buy Zone With Business 'Firing On All Cylinders'
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Stock Of The Day In Buy Zone With Business 'Firing On All Cylinders'. The company is sitting on a $251 billion backlog as military spending grows and commercial aviation provides another solid path to continued growth. Related tickers mentioned: RTX.

articles.title: All You Need to Know About GE (GE) Rating Upgrade to Buy
articles.mainIdea: All You Need to Know About GE (GE) Rating Upgrade to Buy
articles.summary: Zacks: All You Need to Know About GE (GE) Rating Upgrade to Buy. GE (GE) might move higher on growing optimism about its earnings prospects, which is reflected by its upgrade to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
